name: coingecko-get-coins
description: Fetch a paginated list of all coins from CoinGecko. Works by retrieving the entire list and slicing manually.
author: Shinkai

api_key.description: CoinGecko API key for pro endpoints. If omitted, uses free public API with rate limits

page.description: Page number for pagination (1-N). Higher pages may be slower to retrieve. Default: 1

page_size.description: Page size, 1 <= page_size <= 1000. Default 100. Large requests can be slow.

id.description: Unique CoinGecko identifier for the coin (e.g., 'bitcoin')

symbol.description: Trading symbol of the coin in lowercase (e.g., 'btc')

total.description: Total number of coins available across all pages

page_size.description: Number of coins per page in current response
